Row.Text: The beginnings of all things are small. But in the end, I will raise a city of marble where once were bricks.
I am Octavian, Augustus Caesar, a simple first citizen. And emperor of the world.
I am Octavian, Augustus Caesar, a simple first citizen. And emperor of the world.
I am Octavian, Augustus Caesar, a simple first citizen. And emperor of the world.
Come, break your swords on our walls.
Have I played the part well? Then, I exit.
I forge my own path here.
